main.name: Manthan Ank
main.description: Wake Up, Code, learn, eat and sleep!
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manthan! You might also know me as manthanank. I've been coding over 4 years now. I started my journey in web development and enrolled for training programme and also done various internships in front-end as well as backend. Currently working as Software Engineer.

education.school: Sahyadri College of Engineering and Management

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked for 6 months as Associate Software Engineer. Worked in both Front End as well as Backend Projects. Work in most of the dashboard type projects. And also manage the projects & deploy it. Angular Framework in Front End & In backend Nodejs. Stack is MEAN.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Worked for 3 months as Intern. Worked in both Front End as well as Backend Projects. Work is to design and develop in projects. And also manage the projects & deploy it. Angular Framework in Front End & In backend Nodejs + Python. With Frebase as Databse.

work.title: Angular Developer Intern
work.description: Worked for 3 months as Intern And 3 months as Full Time Front End Angular Developer. Work was to design and develop in projects like Admin Panel, IOSense(Main Project), Report UI.

work.title: Student Intern
work.description: Completed one month internship and project on machine learning using python “Conversion Text to Speech Construction Using Multiple Data (CSV file)”.
